meanings.definition: A phrase or inscription in which certain letters express a date or epoch.
meanings.sent1: The ancient monument had a hidden chronogram revealing the year it was built.
meanings.sent2: The historian deciphered the chronogram on the statue to determine its age.
meanings.sent3: The cryptic chronogram on the tombstone made the visitors curious about its meaning.
meanings.sent4: The chronogram on the old clock tower seemed to whisper secrets of the past.
meanings.sent5: The intricate chronogram etched on the cathedral wall captured the attention of all who passed by.
